Hi ,

Is there any way of connecting heritrix to a database ? i wish to kee=
p =C2=A0seed list in db and want heritrix to get it from there . Also I wou=
ld like to store warc file to db

Thanks in advance !


___________________=

 From: Noah Levitt <nlevitt@...>
To: "archive-crawler=
@yahoogroups.com" <archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, June 11=
, 2013 1:57 AM
Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] heritrix
 


=C2=A0 
Hello,

=
> Is is possible to contol crawl order , link etc in H3?

There are a few w=
ays of affecting the order that urls are crawled in. One thing you can do i=
s mark a url as a prerequisite of another. For more advanced and 
highly=C2=
=A0customizable crawl ordering, you can use a custom QueuePrecedencePolicy =
to prioritize queues based on arbitrary criteria, and a UriPrecedencePolicy=
 to prioritize urls within each queue. 

> If I configure two jobs feeding =
them same url then how do I prevent heritrixfrom downloading the same conte=
nt?

You would have to implement a custom alreadySeen check that uses some =
sort of centralized database. 
This doesn't directly address your question =
but you
=C2=A0might
also
want to look at https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/d=
isplay/Heritrix/Multiple+Machine+Crawling

This is another case where it mi=
ght be helpful to step back and explain more broadly what you're trying to =
accomplish, so people 
can offer=C2=A0more practical advice.

Noah




On S=
at, Jun 8, 2013 at 6:28 AM, Smriti Malhotra <smritimalhotra@...> wrot=
e:


>
>
>
>
>Hi All ,
>
>
>Is is possible to contol crawl order , link etc=
 in H3?
>Please help !
>
>
>Thanks in Advance=C2=A0
